revised_title: The Genesis of Edema in Beriberi: A Study of Adrenal Glands and Adrenalin-Content
tldr: This study investigates the relationship between edema in beriberi and the enlargement of adrenal glands, as well as the increase in adrenalin-content. The research shows that in cases of avian beriberi, the weight of the adrenals and the total adrenalin per kilogram of body-weight significantly exceed healthy limits, suggesting a link between adrenal function and the development of edema in beriberi.
